#summary URLs for OpenNI and other prerequisitive downloads
#labels Featured

@en Below is the list of the URLs to download the OpenNI and other prerequisitive modules that I tested. Use 32bit version although your OS may be 64bit.

@ja 現在動作確認できているOpenNI以下のモジュールのダウンロードURLです。お手持ちのOSが64ビット版でも32ビット版を使ってください。

  * OpenNI 32-bit v1.3.3.6: http://www.openni.org/Downloads/OpenNIModules.aspx (Choose OpenNI Binaries > Stable > OpenNI Stable Build for Windows x86 (32-bit) v1.3.3.6 Development Edition)
  * NITE 32-bit v1.4.2.4: http://www.openni.org/Downloads/OpenNIModules.aspx (Choose OpenNI Compliant Middleware Binaries > Stable > PrimeSense NITE Stable Build for Windows x86 (32-bit) v1.4.2.4 Development Edition)
  * SensorKinect driver unstable for OpenNI 5.0.3.4: https://github.com/avin2/SensorKinect/raw/unstable/Bin/SensorKinect-Win-OpenSource32-5.0.3.4.msi

@en The module's provider may change the URLs and the links may become invalid. In case it happened, let me know or look for the files from the sites below by yourself.

@ja モジュール提供元がURLを変え、リンクが無効になってしまう場合があります。このような場合にはお知らせいただくか、または下記のサイトからファイルを自力で検索してください。。

  * OpenNI and NITE: http://www.openni.org/Downloads/OpenNIModules.aspx
  * SensorKinect: https://github.com/avin2/SensorKinect
